reviews.text: A good stay starts with the check in process and Natalia was super helpful and allowed early checkin so I could go to my conference. The decor was cool though seems like was designed a while ago. The checkout and all the staff were super which made this a great experience. And v good breakfast

Room is basic but ok. The bathroom is separated by frosted glass panels from the bedroom (also with a large hole acting as the door handle) so fine for a solo traveller or for those who don‚Äôt need privacy when in the bathroom. No acoustic padding between floors meaning the heavy heeled will sound like a herd of elephants to those in the room below. Didn‚Äôt order breakfast (‚Ç¨19/day) but the location is excellent - any direction walking 15 mins and you hit a main sight. Nice quiet street /safe area.

We‚Äôve been visiting Berlin over and over and this hotel is our number 1 place to stay. Located very centrally, good aircon (important in summer), a nice car garage and friendly staff. Rooms are spacious and comfortable with everything we need.
The hotel is very centrally located in Berlin. There are many tourist locations nearby. Also, the Berlin Central Railway Station is not far away. Service is also good. Food quality is good as well.

The hotel is nice and clean in general and very near to the M√§rkisches Museum and Spittelmarkt UBahn stations as well as the M√§rkisches Ufer, that is a nice place to stroll by the Spree River. It is also really quiet at night. It is located very near the Humboldt Forum and the Museum's Island, if you like taking walks instead of using the Metro. The rooms are big and convenient and they are cleaned daily! The ladies at the reception are always happy to help. A very pleasant experience, totally recommend it. So much better than other hotels around! üòÅ
